summary: Refitting of the fantastic argonian retexture for the male body type SAM.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][center]I did not make this mod, it is the work of MONSTERraider, and the original mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70164/?]can be found here.[/url] It has more variations, I only converted one, the heavy scales version of the lizard, because I think it is the most badass.
This mod works with the SAM body type only, it fully supports Samson and Samuel meshes. Obviously, you'll need the mod SAM - shape atlas for men. Google it, it is on a site where you need to register, I can't link it here :)
This texture is 2K only.[/center][/size]
author: LadyFiszi
